subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tsuyoshi Wada allowed Steve Pearce’s leadoff homer in the seventh inning for Baltimore’s only hit Sunday, and the host Chicago Cubs beat the Orioles for a three-game sweep.
snippet: Tsuyoshi Wada allowed Steve Pearce’s leadoff homer in the seventh inning for Baltimore’s only hit Sunday, and the host Chicago Cubs beat the Orioles for a three-game sweep.
